Service.Name: OGC:WMS
Service.Title: Meteorological Service of Environment Canada OWS Data Server - WMS
Service.Abstract: Meteorological Service of Environment Canada forecasts, analysis and observations layers. Theses web services are available for demo/prototype/pilot purposes only. This is not an operational 24/7 service.

Layer.Title: Meteorological Service of Environment Canada forecasts, analysis and observation layers
Layer.Abstract: Meteorological Service of Environment Canada raw numerical weather prediction (NWP) model data layers and the weather radar mosaic.

Layer.Title: Global Deterministic Prediction System (GDPS)
Layer.Abstract: Global Deterministic Prediction System (GDPS) at 25 km resolution updated at 00 UTC and 12 UTC

Layer.Title: GDPS
Layer.Abstract: Global Deterministic Prediction System (GDPS) at 25 km resolution updated at 00 UTC and 12 UTC

Style.Name: PRECIPRTMMH
Style.Title: Rate of precipitations in millimeters per hour

Layer.Name: GDPS.ETA_I3
Layer.Title: GDPS.ETA - Water retained on the vegetation (KG/M2)

Layer.Name: GDPS.ETA_I4
Layer.Title: GDPS.ETA - Water in the snow pack (KG/M2)
GDPS at pressure levels
Layer.Abstract: Global Deterministic Prediction System (GDPS) at 25 km resolution at pressure levels updated at 00 UTC and 12 UTC

Layer.Title: High Resolution Deterministic System (HRDPS)
Layer.Abstract: High Resolution Deterministic System (HRDPS) at 2.5 km resolution

Layer.Title: HRDPS Arctic
Layer.Abstract: High Resolution Deterministic System (HRDPS) over the arctic area at 2.5 km resolution updated at 06UTC

Style.Name: PRECIPRTMMH
Style.Title: Rate of precipitations in millimeters per hour

Layer.Name: HRDPS.ARCTICETA_I3
Layer.Title: HRDPS.ARCTICETA - Water retained on the vegetation (KG/M2)

Layer.Name: HRDPS.ARCTICETA_I4
Layer.Title: HRDPS.ARCTICETA - Water in the snow pack (KG/M2)
HRDPS East
Layer.Abstract: High Resolution Deterministic System (HRDPS) over the eastern area at 2.5 km resolution, updated at 12 UTC

Style.Name: PRECIPRTMMH
Style.Title: Rate of precipitations in millimeters per hour

Layer.Name: HRDPS.EASTETA_I3
Layer.Title: HRDPS.EASTETA - Water retained on the vegetation (KG/M2)

Layer.Name: HRDPS.EASTETA_I4
Layer.Title: HRDPS.EASTETA - Water in the snow pack (KG/M2)
HRDPS Maritime
Layer.Abstract: High Resolution Deterministic System (HRDPS) over the maritime area at 2.5 km resolution updated at 06UTC

Style.Name: PRECIPRTMMH
Style.Title: Rate of precipitations in millimeters per hour

Layer.Name: HRDPS.MARITIMEETA_I3
Layer.Title: HRDPS.MARITIMEETA - Water retained on the vegetation (KG/M2)

Layer.Name: HRDPS.MARITIMEETA_I4
Layer.Title: HRDPS.MARITIMEETA - Water in the snow pack (KG/M2)
HRDPS West
Layer.Abstract: High Resolution Deterministic System (HRDPS) over the western area at 2.5 km resolution, updated at 18 UTC

Style.Name: PRECIPRTMMH
Style.Title: Rate of precipitations in millimeters per hour

Layer.Name: HRDPS.WESTETA_I3
Layer.Title: HRDPS.WESTETA - Water retained on the vegetation (KG/M2)

Layer.Name: HRDPS.WESTETA_I4
Layer.Title: HRDPS.WESTETA - Water in the snow pack (KG/M2)
North American radar mosaic
Layer.Abstract: Composite of American and Canadian weather radars at 4km resolution updated every 10 minutes

Layer.Title: Regional Air Quality Deterministic Prediction System (RAQDPS)
Layer.Abstract: Regional Air Quality Deterministic Prediction System (RAQDPS), at 10 km resolution updated at 00UTC and 12UTC

Layer.Name: RAQDPS_AF
Layer.Title: RAQDPS - Concentration of fine particulate (Diam. < 2.5 Microns) (micrograms/M3)
Regional Deterministic Precipitation Analysis (RDPA)
Layer.Abstract: Precipitation analysis combining different information sources with a GEM trial field

Layer.Title: RDPA final 6 hours
Layer.Abstract: 6 hours final precipitation analysis

Layer.Title: RDPA preliminary 6 hours
Layer.Abstract: 6 hours initial precipitation analysis

Layer.Title: RDPA 24 hours
Layer.Abstract: 24 hours final precipitation analysis

Layer.Title: Regional Deterministic Prediction System (RDPS)
Layer.Abstract: Regional Deterministic Prediction System (RDPS) at 10 km resolution over Canada updated at 00UTC, 06UTC, 12UTC and 18UTC

Layer.Title: RDPS
Layer.Abstract: Regional Deterministic Prediction System (RDPS) at 10 km resolution over Canada updated at 00UTC, 06UTC, 12UTC and 18UTC

Style.Name: PRECIPRTMMH
Style.Title: Rate of precipitations in millimeters per hour

Layer.Name: RDPS.ETA_I3
Layer.Title: RDPS.ETA - Water retained on the vegetation (KG/M2)

Layer.Name: RDPS.ETA_I4
Layer.Title: RDPS.ETA - Water in the snow pack (KG/M2)
RDPS at pressure levels
Layer.Abstract: Regional Deterministic Prediction System (RDPS) at 10 km resolution over Canada at pressure levels updated at 00UTC, 06UTC, 12UTC and 18UTC
